name: Longsword
description: A versatile sword favored by many warriors.

name: Dragonlance
description: A legendary weapon forged to combat dragons. This lance deals extra damage to dragons and grants advantage on attack rolls against them.

name: Staff of Magius
description: The legendary staff of the wizard Raistlin Majere. This staff functions as a quarterstaff, provides light, and contains powerful spells.

name: Shortbow
description: A simple ranged weapon ideal for hunting and skirmishing.

name: Dagger
description: A simple blade useful for both melee and throwing.

name: Plate Armor
description: Full plate armor consisting of shaped, interlocking metal plates covering the entire body.

name: Dragonscale Mail
description: Armor made from the scales of a dragon. Grants resistance to the damage type of the dragon it came from and advantage on saving throws against the Frightful Presence and breath weapons of dragons.

name: Leather Armor
description: Boiled leather carefully sewn together to provide protection.
properties: Add full Dex modifier to AC

name: Shield
description: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2.

name: Potion of Healing
description: A character who drinks this magical red liquid regains 2d4+2 hit points.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
description: A character who drinks this magical red liquid regains 4d4+4 hit points.

name: Potion of Invisibility
description: When you drink this potion, you become invisible for 1 hour. Anything you wear or carry is invisible with you. The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

name: Ring of Protection
description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

name: Bag of Holding
description: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions. The bag can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
description: While you wear this cloak with its hood up, Wisdom (Perception) checks made to see you have disadvantage, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

name: Rope of Entanglement
description: This rope is 30 feet long and weighs 3 pounds. You can use an action to speak a command word, causing the rope to animate and entangle a creature you can see within 20 feet.

name: Amulet of Health
description: Your Constitution score is 19 while you wear this amulet. It has no effect on you if your Constitution is already 19 or higher.

name: Boots of Speed
description: While you wear these boots, you can use a bonus action to click the boot heels together. Your walking speed becomes 60 feet for 10 minutes.

name: Wand of Magic Missiles
description: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the magic missile spell from it.

name: Flame Tongue Sword
description: You can use a bonus action to speak this magic sword's command word, causing flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra 2d6 fire damage.
